who-we-are-desc:
We provide custom software development services. We create customized software for individuals, startups and small and medium-sized enterprises.

Our team has the expertise and experience to get the job done right, on time and on budget.
service1-card-desc: Design and creation of static and dynamic websites and creation of web applications (PWA), with management of both the frontend and the backend.
service2-card-desc: Our offer includes the creation of mobile applications with cross-platform frameworks such as Flutter, or with native technologies (Kotlin and Swift).
service3-card-desc: Development of solutions for the collection, manipulation and monitoring of real-time and historicized data, mainly using C # and Angular.
process1-desc: We help you set clear goals by identifying your problems and needs, defining what is needed to solve them.
process2-desc: We build a low-fidelity draft first and then continue to refine it until we get you exactly what your looking for.
process3-desc: We start the development process, making sure to stay in touch with you, so as not go outside of what was agreed upon.
process4-desc: After a final response we deliver the finished product, remaining available for after-sales assistance.
quote-desc: Get in touch and we will answer you in 24 hours. We will schedule a call to see how we can help.
faq-a1: Software Development is the process of creating software by writing code. It's a process that involves planning, designing, coding, testing and maintaining the software. The goal of software development is to create a high-quality product that meets the needs of the customer.
faq-q2: How to Choose a Custom Software Development Company?
faq-a2:
The first step is to identify your specific needs and requirements. What type of software do you need? What are the features and functions that are important to you? Once you have a clear understanding of your needs, you can begin to research potential software development companies.

There are many factors to consider when selecting a custom software development company, including:
- Experience and expertise
- Company size
- Methodology and process
- Pricing model
- References and reviews

It is important to ask the right questions and get as much information as possible so that you can make an informed decision. Be sure to ask about the company's experience and expertise in developing the type of software you need, their pricing model, and their process for developing software.
faq-q3: How Much Does Custom Software Development Cost?
faq-a3:
The cost of custom software development can vary greatly depending on the scope and complexity of the project. Generally speaking, the more complex and customized a project is, the higher the cost will be.

Some factors that can affect the cost of custom software development include:
- The size and complexity of the project
- The level of customization required
- The number of features and functions needed
- The level of testing and quality assurance required
- The level of documentation and support required.
faq-a4:
We mainly use C#, Angular, React, Flutter, Docker and .Net Core
You can check out the technologies that we use in more details
faq-q5: How Long Does It Take to Build a Custom Software?
faq-a5:
The amount of time it takes to build a piece of custom software depends on a variety of factors, from the size and complexity of the project to the resources and expertise of the development team. In most cases, small projects can be completed in a matter of weeks, while larger, more complex applications can take several months or even years to develop.

There is no one-size-fits-all answer to this question, as the development timeframe for each project will vary based on its unique requirements. However, in general, it is important to budget for at least a few months of development time when planning for a custom software project. This will help ensure that your project hits its deadline and avoids any unexpected delays.
faq-q6: What control do you have over project development?
faq-a6: You'll be able to monitor the process through regular calls and meetings, track your tasks' status as they progress.
answer-in-48h: and we will get back within 48 hours.
website-page-description:
We understand that your website is an important reflection of your business. That's why we take the time to get to know you and your company before we start work on your project

We'll learn about your products or services, your target audience, and your goals for the site. With this information in hand, we'll be able to create a custom website that is both visually appealing and effective in meeting your needs.
why-website: Why every business need a great website.
website-reason-1: of users admit to making judgments about a company's credibility based on their website design
website-reason-2: of B2b customers search the web before making a purchase
website-reason-3: of website users' first impressions are related to the design
website-features-title: Some of the features of our websites.
website-feature-1-description: Our team of web developers and designers create websites that are not only aesthetically pleasing, but also user-friendly and easy to navigate. We understand that first impressions are important, and our websites reflect that.
website-feature-2-description: We understand that every business is unique. That's why we offer custom website design services to fit the specific needs of our clients.
website-feature-3-description: In today's world, more and more people are using their phones and tablets to access the internet. That's why our websites are responsive and optimized for mobile.
website-feature-4-description: A/B testing is a technique used to compare two versions of a web page to see which one performs better. By running A/B tests on your website, you can fine-tune your design, content, and conversion rate to ensure that your site is always making progress.
website-feature-5-description: Our websites are optimized for search engines, making it easier for customers to find you online. In addition to SEO, we also offer a variety of other marketing services to help you promote your business online.
website-feature-6-description: Writing copy that sells can be a tough nut to crack. You want your words to be persuasive, but not pushy; Informative, but not boring. It's a delicate balance, and one that's hard to achieve without years of practice. We take care of that for you.
simm-short-description: E-commerce development for a construction, customization and sale of packaging machines and materials company
website-faq-q1: How much does a website cost?
website-faq-a1:
The cost of a website can vary greatly depending on the needs and features of the project. Some factors that can influence the cost of a website are:

  • The complexity of the website's structure and navigation
  • The amount and quality of the website's content (text, images, videos, etc.)
  • The use of advanced features such as online shopping carts, user login, support for multiple languages, etc.
  • The use of a custom design or a pre-existing template
  • The choice of a specific development platform (e.g., WordPress, Joomla, Drupal, etc.)
  • The choice of an agency or individual professional to create the website

The cost of a website can range from a few hundred euros to several thousand euros, depending on the needs and features of the project. It is important to accurately assess your needs and budget before starting a website development project.
website-faq-q2: When do I have to pay for the website?
website-faq-a2: Usually an initial deposit is agreed upon to start the project, followed by additional installments during the development process and finally a final balance once the website has been delivered and accepted by the client. In some cases, a monthly payment may be required for website maintenance and updates.
website-faq-q3: Will the website be accessible on all devices, regardless of their size or resolutions?
website-faq-a3: Yes, the websites we develop are accessible on all devices, regardless of their size or resolutions. Responsive design is an approach that allows a website to automatically adapt to the size of the device screen used to view it, ensuring a good browsing experience for users regardless of the device used.
website-faq-q4: Do you offer maintenance and update services for websites not created by you?
website-faq-a4: Yes, we offer maintenance and update services for websites not created by us. We have the necessary skills and knowledge to work on existing websites and can intervene to update their content, solve any problems or add new features. If you are looking for an agency or individual professional for the maintenance or update of a website not created by you, we are available to discuss your project and your needs.
website-faq-q5: My website is not ranking well on search engines, can I count on you to optimize it?
website-faq-a5:
Yes, you can count on us to optimize your website for search engines.

If your website is not ranking well on search engines, we can help you identify problems and implement the necessary solutions to improve its ranking. We can also provide you with tips and best practices to optimize your website so that it is easier to find and navigate for users and search engines. If you are interested in our SEO services, do not hesitate to contact us to discuss your project and your needs.
website-faq-q6: In which phases does the development of the website or ecommerce take place?
website-faq-a6:
The development of a website or an ecommerce usually includes the following phases:

  1. Design: in this phase the structure and content of the site or the ecommerce, navigation and general appearance.

  2. Development: in this phase the code to create the site or ecommerce pages is written and the feature requests are implemented .

  3. Test: in this phase we verify that the site or ecommerce works correctly and is displayed correctly on different browsers and devices.

  4. Delivery: Once the site or ecommerce is complete, it is delivered to the customer for review and approval.

  5. Launch: Once the site o the ecommerce has been approved by the customer, it is published online and made accessible to all users.

  6. Maintenance: once the site or ecommerce has been launched, it is important to keep it up to date and resolve any issues that may arise.

Obviously, each project is unique and development phases may vary according to the specific needs of the client and the type of site or ecommerce you are creating.
app-page-description:
At Webion, we are passionate about creating apps that are not only useful, but also easy and fun to use. We believe that great design is essential to delivering a great user experience, so we take care to craft each app with a high level of attention and detail.

In short, we go the extra mile to create apps that our users will love.

Based on your needs, we can create applications with cross-platform frameworks such as Flutter, or native technologies such as Kotlin and Swift
app-features-title: Some of the features of our apps.
app-features-1-description: We believe that form and function should go hand-in-hand, which is why our team of experts takes a holistic approach to app development.
app-features-2-description: With custom-made content and layout, you can cater for user's needs by moving things around or changing colours. You could also prioritise certain topics in order that they are more interesting.
app-features-3-description: We place a strong emphasis on usability testing, in order to make sure that our apps are as user-friendly as possible.
app-features-4-description: Managing an effective store page takes time and effort, which is why we're here to help. We can take care of everything from writing eye-catching descriptions to creating engaging visuals.
app-features-5-description: Security is of the utmost importance to us when creating apps. We understand that users are trusting us with their personal data, and we take that responsibility very seriously.
app-features-6-description: Our team understands how important it is to be able to access your data from anywhere, at any time. That's why we create apps that have multi-device synchronization built-in.
app-faq-q1: How much will it cost to develop my app?
app-faq-a1: The cost of developing an app depends on a number of factors, including the complexity of the project, the number of platforms the app will be released on, the number of features the app will need to have, the number of designers and developers involved in the project, and so on. In general, the cost of developing an app can range from a few hundred euros to several thousand euros, or even more.
app-faq-q2: Will I own the source code?
app-faq-a2: Yes, you will be granted the appropriate copyright or license rights for the custom code we write for your project. We are transparent about intellectual property rights, and you will have the opportunity to review our code ownership terms before we begin the project.
app-faq-q3: What programming languages and frameworks do you use?
app-faq-a3: We use Flutter for multiplatform applications and Kotlin and Swift for native apps
app-faq-q4: Is it possible to integrate our existing web systems, tools, websites, CRM, etc. with the app we are developing?
app-faq-a4: Yes, it is generally possible to integrate an app with existing web systems, tools, websites, and CRM systems. The specific steps and technical requirements for integration will depend on the specific systems and tools being used and the desired level of integration. If you would like to integrate your app with existing systems and tools, it is best to discuss this with us to determine the feasibility and any necessary steps.
app-faq-q5: Is it possible for your team to collaborate with our existing technical, design, or marketing team during the development process?
app-faq-a5: Yes, it is generally possible for our team to collaborate with your existing technical, design, or marketing team during the development process. We believe that effective collaboration is key to successful projects, and we are happy to work with your team to ensure a smooth and seamless development process. However, it is important to note that the specific details and arrangements for collaboration will depend on the needs and capabilities of your team and the scope of the project. If you would like to discuss the possibility of collaboration with our team, we would be happy to discuss this further.
app-faq-q6: Do you build web applications too?
app-faq-a6: Yes, we are able to build web applications as well. In addition to mobile app development, we offer a range of web development services, including the development of custom web applications, e-commerce websites, and more. If you have a specific web application in mind, we would be happy to discuss your project with you and provide more information about our web development capabilities.
industry-page-description: At Webion, we create software solutions that enable companies to take advantage of this new industrial landscape. Our products help businesses to collect and utilize data more effectively, making their operations more efficient and reducing their costs. In addition, our solutions help businesses to better understand their customers and develop new products and services that meet their needs. We are proud to be at the forefront of this new industrial revolution, helping our clients to thrive in this new era.
industry-features-1-description: We get the data we need from several sources inside your business.
industry-features-2-description: We collect this data from different sources and we make sense of it through friendly user interfaces and modern design
industry-features-3-description: We give you the tools to analyze these information, showing you some insights and telling you what's going on in your business.
industry-faq-q1: Is Industry 4.0 the same as IOT
industry-faq-a1:
Industry 4.0 refers to the fourth industrial revolution, which is characterized by the integration of advanced technologies such as artificial intelligence, the Internet of Things, and machine learning into manufacturing and other industries. The goal of Industry 4.0 is to improve efficiency and productivity by creating smart factories and supply chains that can self-optimize and adapt to changing conditions.

The Internet of Things (IoT) is a network of devices, such as sensors, machines, and appliances, that are connected to the internet and can communicate with each other and exchange data. The IoT enables devices to be connected and controlled remotely, and it has the potential to transform a wide range of industries by enabling real-time data collection, monitoring, and automation.

While Industry 4.0 and the IoT are related and often overlap, Industry 4.0 encompasses a broader range of technologies and concepts, including not just the IoT, but also artificial intelligence, big data, and more. The IoT is an important component of Industry 4.0, but it is not the only one.
industry-faq-q2: Do you offer support and training for users of your software?
industry-faq-a2: Yes, we offer support and training for users of our software. We believe that providing ongoing support and training is essential to the success of our software and to the satisfaction of our clients. We have a dedicated team of support and training professionals who are available to help users get the most out of our software and address any questions or issues that may arise.
industry-faq-q3: How do you stay up-to-date on the latest technologies and industry trends?
industry-faq-a3: Yes, we stay up-to-date on the latest technologies and industry trends. We understand that the software development industry is constantly evolving, and we believe it is important to stay at the forefront of these changes to ensure that we are providing our clients with the best possible solutions. To stay up-to-date, we regularly attend industry conferences and events, participate in professional development opportunities, and follow relevant industry blogs and publications. We also encourage our team members to stay current on the latest technologies and trends through continuing education and personal research. By staying informed, we are able to bring the latest and most innovative technologies to our clients and help them stay ahead of the curve in their own industries.
industry-faq-q4: How do you handle maintenance and updates for your software?
industry-faq-a4: We handle maintenance and updates for our software through a combination of proactive and reactive approaches. Proactively, we regularly release updates and upgrades to our software to improve its functionality, fix any bugs or issues, and ensure that it remains compatible with the latest technologies and platforms. We also offer maintenance and support plans to our clients, which provide access to our team of experts for assistance with maintenance and updates, as well as other services such as bug fixes and performance enhancements. Reactively, we also have a process in place to quickly address any issues or problems that may arise with our software. This includes a system for tracking and prioritizing issues, as well as a team of technicians who are available to troubleshoot and resolve any problems as they arise. Overall, our goal is to ensure that our software remains reliable, efficient, and up-to-date for our clients.
industry-faq-q5: Can you customize the software to meet our specific needs and requirements?
industry-faq-a5:
Yes, we are able to customize the software to meet your specific needs and requirements. Customization can involve modifying or adapting existing software to fit your needs, or developing custom software from scratch to meet your specific requirements.

To ensure that the software meets your needs, we will work with you to understand your business processes, needs, and goals. We will then use this information to create a software solution that is tailored to your specific needs. This may involve customizing the user interface, adding or modifying features, integrating with existing systems, and more.

We are committed to providing high-quality, customized software solutions that meet the unique needs of our clients. If you have specific requirements or needs for your software, we would be happy to discuss them with you and explore how we can help.

who-are-we-description:
At Webion, we take the time to get to know our clients and their specific needs before we start building a custom solution. We believe that this personalized approach is the best way to create software that truly meets the needs of our clients.

As a result, we have a track record of delivering high-quality, user-friendly software that our clients love. If you're looking for a team that will work with you to create a custom solution, contact us today. We're confident that you won't be disappointed.We are located in via Panfilo Castaldi 3, in Modena.
c#: C# is a modern, object-oriented, and type-safe programming language. C# enables developers to build many types of secure and robust applications that run in .NET.
angular: Angular is a TypeScript-based free and open-source web application framework led by the Angular Team at Google and by a community of individuals and corporations.
flutter: Flutter is a free and open-source mobile UI framework created by Google and released in May 2017.
docker: Docker is a set of platform as a service products that use OS-level virtualization to deliver software in packages called containers.
react: React is a free and open-source front-end JavaScript library for building user interfaces based on UI components.
net-core: .NET Core is a new version of .NET Framework, which is a free, open-source, general-purpose development platform maintained by Microsoft.
next-js: Next.js is an open-source web development framework created by Vercel enabling React-based web applications with server-side rendering and generating static websites.
sql: Structured Query Language, abbreviated as SQL, is a domain-specific language used in programming and designed for managing data held in a relational database management system
mongo-db: MongoDB is a source-available cross-platform document-oriented database program. Classified as a NoSQL database program, MongoDB uses JSON-like documents with optional schemas

simm-study-description: Simm Imballaggi is a company specialized in the construction, customization and sale of packaging machines and materials.The treated products are selected on the basis of careful and continuous monitoring of the national and international market, with the aim of constantly improving quality and technology.The quality of the service is the result of the maximum commitment that all the staff place on a daily basis, in order to always offer the best product and the utmost professionalism.
simm-problem-description: The website they had was really outdated and didn't reflect who they were now as a company. It needed to change in order for them not only acquire new customers, but also give users an idea on what makes their business so great!
simm-solution-description: When we redesigned our website, it modernized and reflected the values of this company. The user experience improved significantly as well so that users are more likely to subscribe or purchase from them once they've visited the website!
kaire-study-description:
Kaire was born in 2015 from the will and professional skills of a group of technicians with twenty years of experience in the field of automation and industrial process controls.

At the beginning of this year, a strong and lasting collaboration was born between Kaire and Webion for the development of a series of products for Industry 4.0.
kaire-short-description: Kaire is an industrial automation company located in Modena.
kaire-problem-description:
Kaire's main problem was the lack of developers available to develop a suite of products designed for industrial automation.
After interfacing with our reality, we started offering consultancy and shortly after a strong and long-lasting collaboration was born.
kaire-solution-description: A series of web applications have been developed for monitoring industrial plants, using two main technologies Angluar for the front-end while .NET-Core for monitoring and data saving services on PLCs.
massyve-study-description: Massyve is a professional music producer, sound designer with 15 years of experience. In his music career he have worked with a wide variety of artists on many different music genres. He produced for companies such as Tesla Motors and for Netflix Movies
massyve-problem-description: Massyve was trying to get new clients through google ads campaigns but he was not getting results. He was spending a lot in advertising but nobody was contacting him, apart from some fake users. He had a landing page that was not optimized neither in terms of graphics, nor for the lighthouse and expecially not for the conversions.
massyve-solution-description:
We studied his problem deeply and we designed a new landing page that better showed his good qualities. We incorporated some elements for improving the conversions such as as:
  • an unique selling proposition
  • more social proof
  • some key benefits
  • better call to actions

Considering the restricted time and budget for building the landing page we decided to use webflow.
After we took care of the landing page we studied a strategic google ads campaign and we managed it for a month.
massyve-result-description-1: These were the results he had with the previous landing page and campaign
massyve-result-description-2: These are instead our results. We can see that we doubled the conversion rate of the landing page, while decreasing the cost per click by 32.43% and the cost for conversion by 70.17%. At the same time we improved the click through rate by 258.56%.
massyve-result-description-3: These are just the results of the first month. We inserted analysis tools inside the web page so that we can keep monitoring the behaviours of the users and keep improving the landing page and the campaign through time.
bocconi-study-description: Radio Bocconi is the web radio of the Bocconi University of the same name. It was founded in 2008 on the initiative of a group of university students and has established itself over the years as an integral part of a network entirely managed by students: the Student Media Center (together with web TV - BocconiTV, and the newspaper - Tra i Leoni).
bocconi-description-description:
Radio Bocconi consists of a cross-platform mobile app created in Flutter for the Bocconi radio podcast. The app is made up of 3 pages:
  • Home page to listen to Bocconi radio
  • Blog page to see the list of Bocconi blog articles
  • Page article to see the single blog article

There is also the social and information section of the app.

The app allows you to view content in light mode or dark mode.
